definitions.definition: The turning or bending of any wave , such as a light or sound wave, when it passes from one medium into another of different optical density .
The degree to which a metal or compound can withstand heat

main_definition: ( physics ) The turning or bending of any wave , such as a light or sound wave, when it passes from one medium into another of different optical density .
secondary_definitions: ( metallurgy ) The degree to which a metal or compound can withstand heat
